name: Carrionette
languages: understands the languages of its creator

traits.False Object: If the carrionette is motionless at the start of combat, it has advantage on its initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the carrionette move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 15+1d4 + 13 Wisdom (Perception) check to discern that the carrionette is animate.
traits.Unusual Nature: The carrionette doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
